metadata.title: CVE-2024-49875 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfsd: map the EBADMSG to nfserr_io to avoid warningExt4 will throw -EBADMSG through ext4_readdir when a checksum erroroccurs, resulting in the following WARNING.Fix it by mapping EBADMSG to nfserr_io.nfsd_buffered_readdir iterate_dir // -EBADMSG -74  ext4_readdir // .iterate_shared   ext4_dx_readdir
